required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Frankfurt Thrombophilia Registry - Evaluation of Patients With Venous Thromboembolism

brief_summary.textblock: Consecutive patients with acute or previous venous thromboembolism are enrolled in this registry. Using a standardized questionnaire, clinical data detailing venous thromboembolism and contributing VTE risk factors are recorded. Results of technical and laboratory investigations including screening for thrombophilic disorders were additionally entered into the database.

arm_group.description: Patients with acute or previous venous thromboembolism >18 years of age

study_pop.textblock: consecutive patients with acute or previous VTE >18 years of age

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Acute or previous VTE
Exclusion Criteria:
